channel.title: CVE Feed for Riello UPS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Riello UPS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-3372|2024-08-03T01:07:06.494Z -- riello%20ups -- netman-204
item.description: There is a CSRF vulnerability on Netman-204 version 02.05. An attacker could manage to change administrator passwords through a Cross Site Request Forgery due to the lack of proper validation on the CRSF token. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to access the administrator panel, being able to modify different parameters that are critical for industrial operations.

item.title: CVE-2022-47892|2024-08-03T15:02:36.645Z -- riello%20ups -- netman-204
item.description: All versions of NetMan 204 could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read a file (config.cgi) containing sensitive information, like credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-47891|2024-08-03T15:02:36.509Z -- riello%20ups -- netman-204
item.description: All versions of NetMan 204 allow an attacker that knows the MAC and serial number of the device to reset the administrator password via the legitimate recovery function.

item.title: CVE-2022-47893|2024-08-03T15:02:36.480Z -- riello%20ups -- netman-204
item.description: There is a remote code execution vulnerability that affects all versions of NetMan 204. A remote attacker could upload a firmware file containing a webshell, that could allow him to execute arbitrary code as root.
